blocks.title: Our Philosophy
blocks.desc: Turning our customers' dreams into reality by creating meaningful playgrounds for all ages.

blocks.title: Our Mission
blocks.desc: Commitment to professionalism and creativity in every project to enhance community experiences.

blocks.title: Our Vision
blocks.desc: Bringing people closer to nature, creating greener and healthier living spaces.

blocks.title: Safety and Quality
blocks.desc: Safety is our top priority, and quality is the foundation for building customer trust.

about.title: About us
about.p1: Hasake Co., Ltd. is the official representative office in Vietnam of the HKS Group with over 20 years of establishment and development. Our head office is located in Bangkok, Thailand, and we also have representative offices and factories in Malaysia, India, China, Canada, South Korea, Italy, the United States, Hungary, the Philippines, and more.
about.p2: We provide and install indoor and outdoor playground equipment for children such as slides, spring riders, play structures, bumper cars, swings, seesaws, ball pits, carousels, trampolines, etc., as well as outdoor fitness equipment, bowling equipment, amusement equipment, water park equipment, and safety rubber flooring.
about.p3: Our products are manufactured to European standards (ISO 9001 certification), ensuring safety, non-toxicity, and are used in many countries around the world.
about.p4: We maintain professional teams in each location, always ready to serve and meet customer needs in the best possible way.

season.title: Season avanue
season.p1: Season avanue is a collection of seasonal play solutions proposed by Hasake for shopping malls and mixed-use complexes. Each area is optimized for crowd flow, parental visibility, and durable materials that meet international safety standards.
season.p2: The modular design enables quick theme upgrades and seasonal replacements without long downtime. Rubber flooring, soft edge protection, and antimicrobial coating support safe operations, easy cleaning, and lower maintenance costs.

bowling.title: Green bowling
bowling.p1: Green bowling targets family-friendly bowling spaces with smart lane layouts, child barriers, and an intuitive scoring UI. Energy-saving LED lighting and low-emission materials help reduce operational consumption.
bowling.p2: Hasake provides end-to-end design and installation services: floorplan optimization, acoustic standards, and scheduled maintenance processes — all to enhance experience, increase dwell time, and optimize revenue for FEC/retailtainment models.

water.title: Water park
water.p1: Hasake’s water park solutions include FRP slides, splash pads, interactive fountains, tipping buckets, along with a compliant circulation–filtration–disinfection system. Designs prioritize slide safety, anti-slip surfaces, and fast drainage.
water.p2: Our delivery process follows standards from site survey, concept design, shop drawings, construction to commissioning. We train on-site staff and provide maintenance to ensure safe, stable year-round operations.
